TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HideModuleNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class HideModuleNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class HideModuleNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 当应用于模块时， 属性允许仅使用模块所需的限定访问模块成员。

span.span: The attribute, when applied to a module, allows the module members to be accessed using only the qualification needed for the module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于公开模块成员而不显示模块本身。This attribute is useful for exposing module members without showing the module itself. 对于 Visual Basic 中使用 IntelliSense 在 Visual Studio 集成开发环境 (IDE)，该模块将不显示语句完成列表内。When using IntelliSense in the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for Visual Basic, the module does not show in the statement completion list. 相反，IntelliSense 会显示模块成员。Instead, IntelliSense shows the module members. 模块名称处于隐藏状态，即使是通过模块仍可访问模块成员。Even when the module name is hidden, the module members are still accessible through the module. 如果成员名称相冲突的另一个标识符或与另一个模块的成员`HideModuleNameAttribute`特性，该成员不会显示在 IntelliSense 中在模块级别。If a member name conflicts with another identifier or with a member of another module with the `HideModuleNameAttribute` attribute, then the member does not show in IntelliSense at the level of the module. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`HideModuleNameAttribute`属性将添加到的数据库对象`My`，这可以通过访问`My.Database`。This example shows how to use the `HideModuleNameAttribute` attribute to add a Database object to `My`, which can be accessed through `My.Database`. [!code-vb[VbCnAttributes#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbCnAttributes/VB/Class2.vb#26)] `Namespace`语句必须出现在之外的任何类或模块。The `Namespace` statement must appear outside of any classes or modules.

summary.span: 初始化 属性的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the attribute.
